channel.title: Strange Audio Problems in Ep2
channel.description:
For some reason, the audio volumes for Ep2 are inverted for me... for example, sounds that are produced behind the player are always louder than sounds produced in front of the player, whereas it used to be the other way around.
The same thing with distance: the farther away a sound is, the louder it is, and if sounds are produced directly in front of the player, it is practically nonexistent.
I am confused. This just started happening and hasn't happened before. :frowning:

item.title: Strange Audio Problems in Ep2
item.dc:creator: coldroll
item.description:
Yes I have. It only happens on mods for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Strange Audio Problems in Ep2
item.dc:creator: baconeggs
item.description:
This is by far one of the trippiest glitches I’ve ever heard of. Tried updating your sound drivers?

Read full topic

item.title: Strange Audio Problems in Ep2

item.description:
It’s been like that (2 speakers when I have speakers, headphones when I plug in headphones). Haven’t ever encountered problems with those settings before.

Read full topic

item.description:
Change from 2 speakers to headphones or vice versa.
